scripts.build:salmos: (cd plugins/bungee/salmos && mvn clean && mvn package && cp ./target/Salmos-0.0.1.jar ../../../servers/0-proxy/plugins)
scripts.build:antiburrow: (cd plugins/spigot/antiburrow && mvn clean && mvn package && cp ./target/AntiBurrow-0.0.1.jar ../../../servers/2-main/plugins)
scripts.start:iam: docker-compose up --build gateway warehouse warehouse-migrate identity-web
scripts.start:website: docker-compose up --build gateway warehouse warehouse-migrate identity-web website
scripts.start:rcon-test: docker-compose up --build gateway warehouse warehouse-migrate identity-web rcon minecraft-main
